verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* certain \w men|strong="G5100"\w* which came \w down|strong="G2718"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \add and said\add*, \w Except|strong="G1437"\w* ye be \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w* after the \w manner|strong="G1485"\w* of \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w ye|strong="G1410"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G1410"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

When \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w had|strong="G1096"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w small|strong="G3641"\w* \w dissension|strong="G4714"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w disputation|strong="G4803"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, they determined \w that|strong="G5021"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, should go \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w question|strong="G2213"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3767"\w* being brought on their \w way|strong="G4311"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, they passed \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w Phenice|strong="G5403"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*, \w declaring|strong="G1555"\w* the \w conversion|strong="G1995"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w caused|strong="G4160"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they were \w come|strong="G3854"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, they were \w received|strong="G0588"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add of\add* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* they \w declared|strong="G0312"\w* all things \w that|strong="G3745"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* there rose \w up|strong="G1817"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w sect|strong="G0139"\w* of the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* which \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* it was needful \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w circumcise|strong="G4059"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* to \w command|strong="G3853"\w* \add them\add* to \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* came \w together|strong="G4863"\w* for to \w consider|strong="G1492"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w matter|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when there had \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w disputing|strong="G4803"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1987"\w* how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* a \w good|strong="G0575"\w* \w while|strong="G2250"\w* \w ago|strong="G0744"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* made \w choice|strong="G1586"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, that the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* should \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, which knoweth the \w hearts|strong="G2589"\w*, \w bare|strong="G3140"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w giving|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \add he did\add* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G1252"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w difference|strong="G1252"\w* \w between|strong="G3342"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w purifying|strong="G2511"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* by \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3568"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w why|strong="G5101"\w* tempt \w ye|strong="G3985"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, to \w put|strong="G2007"\w* a \w yoke|strong="G2218"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w neck|strong="G5137"\w* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* were \w able|strong="G2480"\w* to \w bear|strong="G0941"\w*?

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* we \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* we shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w even|strong="G5158"\w* \w as|strong="G2596"\w* \w they|strong="G2548"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* kept \w silence|strong="G4601"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gave \w audience|strong="G0191"\w* to \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w declaring|strong="G1834"\w* \w what|strong="G3745"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had \w wrought|strong="G4160"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* they had \w held|strong="G4601"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w peace|strong="G4601"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w hearken|strong="G0191"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3450"\w*:

\w Simeon|strong="G4826"\w* hath \w declared|strong="G1834"\w* \w how|strong="G2531"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* at the \w first|strong="G4412"\w* did \w visit|strong="G1980"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, to \w take|strong="G2983"\w* out of \w them|strong="G1537"\w* a \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w agree|strong="G4856"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*,

\w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5023"\w* I will \w return|strong="G0390"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will build \w again|strong="G0456"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is fallen \w down|strong="G4098"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I will build \w again|strong="G0456"\w* the \w ruins|strong="G2679"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w set|strong="G0461"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G0461"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3704"\w* the \w residue|strong="G2645"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w* might \w seek|strong="G1567"\w* after the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* is \w called|strong="G1941"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, who \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*.

\w Known|strong="G1110"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the beginning of the \w world|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* sentence \w is|strong="G2919"\w*, that we \w trouble|strong="G3926"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* them, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* from \w among|strong="G0575"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* are \w turned|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* that we \w write|strong="G1989"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, that they \w abstain|strong="G0567"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w pollutions|strong="G0234"\w* of \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* things \w strangled|strong="G4156"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w old|strong="G0744"\w* \w time|strong="G1074"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* in \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, being \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* pleased \w it|strong="G1380"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, to \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* their own \w company|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*; \add namely\add*, \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w surnamed|strong="G1941"\w* \w Barsabas|strong="G0923"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*, \w chief|strong="G2233"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*:

And they \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \add letters\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* after this \w manner|strong="G3592"\w*; The \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \add send\add* \w greeting|strong="G5463"\w* unto the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w*:

Forasmuch \w as|strong="G1894"\w* we have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* which went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* have \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* with \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \w subverting|strong="G0384"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \add Ye must\add* be \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*: to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w gave|strong="G1291"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \add such\add* \w commandment|strong="G1291"\w*:

It seemed \w good|strong="G1380"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, being \w assembled|strong="G1096"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w*, to \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*,

\w Men|strong="G0444"\w* that have \w hazarded|strong="G3860"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w lives|strong="G5590"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

We have \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*, \w who|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G0518"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G0518"\w* \add you\add* the same \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w mouth|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it seemed \w good|strong="G1380"\w* to the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, to lay \w upon|strong="G2007"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w greater|strong="G4119"\w* \w burden|strong="G0922"\w* \w than|strong="G4133"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w necessary|strong="G1876"\w* \w things|strong="G5130"\w*;

That ye \w abstain|strong="G0567"\w* from meats offered to \w idols|strong="G1494"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* from \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* from things \w strangled|strong="G4156"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* from \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*: \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* if ye \w keep|strong="G1301"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, ye shall \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w well|strong="G2095"\w*. Fare ye \w well|strong="G4517"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w when|strong="G3303"\w* they were \w dismissed|strong="G0630"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w together|strong="G4863"\w*, they \w delivered|strong="G1929"\w* the \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w*:
\add Which\add* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* they had \w read|strong="G0314"\w*, they \w rejoiced|strong="G5463"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w*, \w exhorted|strong="G3870"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w confirmed|strong="G1991"\w* \add them\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* after they had \w tarried|strong="G4160"\w* \add there\add* a \w space|strong="G5550"\w*, they were let \w go|strong="G0630"\w* \w in|strong="G3326"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.
\w Notwithstanding|strong="G1161"\w* it \w pleased|strong="G1380"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w* to \w abide|strong="G1961"\w* \w there|strong="G0847"\w* \w still|strong="G1961"\w*.

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w continued|strong="G1304"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2097"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, Let us go \w again|strong="G1994"\w* \w and|strong="G1211"\w* \w visit|strong="G1980"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w where|strong="G3739"\w* we have \w preached|strong="G2605"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \add and see\add* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* they \w do|strong="G2192"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w determined|strong="G1011"\w* to take with \w them|strong="G4838"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, whose surname \w was|strong="G2564"\w* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w thought|strong="G0515"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w good|strong="G0515"\w* to take \w him|strong="G4838"\w* with \w them|strong="G5126"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w departed|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Pamphylia|strong="G3828"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G4905"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* with \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3767"\w* the \w contention|strong="G3948"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* so sharp between \w them|strong="G3948"\w*, \w that|strong="G5620"\w* they departed \w asunder|strong="G0673"\w* \w one|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w other|strong="G0240"\w*: and \w so|strong="G5037"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w*, and \w sailed|strong="G1602"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="G2954"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w chose|strong="G1951"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*, and \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*, being \w recommended|strong="G3860"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* unto the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he went \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w*, \w confirming|strong="G1991"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*.
